index.speaker: samrat-saha
index.name: Machine Learning using Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio
index.description: In this talk I will be presenting on how a user can leverage the Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio. I will be covering an unsupervised Machine Learning Algorithm (K-means clustering) as an example. I will cover the basics of k-means to provide a foundation on the algorithm. The talk will demonstrate all aspects of the ML pipeline, from importing your data set, to cleaning it, to training against it. It should provide a solid foundation on how to use the Azure Machine Learning Studio and allow a developer or data scientist to ramp up quickly with their experiments and lay the legwork for running it in production.
index.title: Machine Learning using Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio | Sessions | MKE DOT NET 2017
index.metaDescription: Machine Learning using Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio
